Package gameengine

Class RandomEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameengine.RandomEvents
  • public class RandomEvents
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements all the random events specified in the project specification.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Crew crew

      private java.util.ArrayList<Items> itemList  
      private java.util.ArrayList<Planet> planets

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RandomEvents​(Crew crew, SpaceShip ship, java.util.ArrayList<Planet> planets, SpaceOutpost sp)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void affectPlanet()
      Assigns a random food, medicine, money, space ship part to a few planets.
      void alienPirates()
      Implementation of Alien pirate functionality Alien invasion sound - http://soundbible.com/suggest.php?q=alien&x=0&y=0 When this method is called a random food/medicine item is looted by the aliens.
      void asteroidBelt()
      This method displays the J option pane and informs the player if the ship just hit an asteroid and also calls the damage shield method to updates the ship health.
      void callAsteroidBelt()
      Calls the asteroid method and reduces the ship's health depending upon the current shield health of the ship
      void damageShield()
      Reduces the ship health by 40 points
      void randomEvent()
      This methods uses the random generator to generate number within the specified range.
      void spacePlague()
      Uses random generator based on the length of the crew member list and gives that random person the space plague only if they are not type nebula.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • randomEvent

        public void randomEvent()
        This methods uses the random generator to generate number within the specified range. based on the number generate events such as alien pirates, space plague and asteroid hit happens

      • callAsteroidBelt

        public void callAsteroidBelt()
        Calls the asteroid method and reduces the ship's health depending upon the current shield health of the ship

      • alienPirates

        public void alienPirates()
        Implementation of Alien pirate functionality Alien invasion sound - http://soundbible.com/suggest.php?q=alien&x=0&y=0 When this method is called a random food/medicine item is looted by the aliens.

      • spacePlague

        public void spacePlague()
        Uses random generator based on the length of the crew member list and gives that random person the space plague only if they are not type nebula.

      • asteroidBelt

        public void asteroidBelt()
        This method displays the J option pane and informs the player if the ship just hit an asteroid and also calls the damage shield method to updates the ship health. Asteroid hit - http://soundbible.com/1592-Missile-Impact.html

      • damageShield

        public void damageShield()
        Reduces the ship health by 40 points

      • affectPlanet

        public void affectPlanet()
        Assigns a random food, medicine, money, space ship part to a few planets.
